GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.16.19
GSD.description:
drm/dp: Fix off-by-one in register cache size

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit e504041c01d95a761d69803352a6a6689f6f9229, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit e2e16da398d9149ede0162a55f44537582aed2e7. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/dp: Fix off-by-one in register cache size
